title: Sampler, 1730
medium:
Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, and stem stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Parrot, church, lion, and rooster at top.  Alphabet and pattern bands at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1730.
1730. Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, and stem stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-293.
